summary: Diff implements a selectable room layout variant ('standard' vs 'no-seating') via a Zustand store and TopNav toggle, conditionally hides table/chair meshes in both the full WebGL CafeEnvironment and the BasicCafeRoomFallback, and adds a counter-front "Menu" label rendered as bold white text with a green neon glow using a canvas texture plane attached to the Counter component (used in both environments).
